name: Selfie Simulator (ZenGame)
description:
Controls

Q&E = Rotate Shoulder around itself.

W&S = Rotate Shoulder/Elbow Up and down.

A&D = Rotate Shoulder around itself.

Goal

Trying to take a selfie as close to the train as possible.  

Describtion

To start the game, press play in the main menu. 

This game was made by 4 other people and me during the NordicGamejam 2018. Beside general game design elements and design, I made pixel art assets for the game and made parts of the UI.  The game is supposed to be an satire/serious game about selfie culture. Each year more and more people gets killed or injured because they tried to take a selfie in a dangerous situation. 

The game is a bit buggy, so it might decide that you have been hit by the train before you have actually been hit by the train, and therefore end the game prematurely. We also implemented a system where when a selfie is taken the game was supposed to calculate a score based on certain points in its viewport. However, This is not working in this version,
